Simplified in your browser 简体字的浏览器显示:回

Simplified in Unicode standard 简体字的Unicode标准:U+56DE

Main pronunciation 主要发音: huí

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to turn around.

English senses 英语理解:

Usage example 用法举例: 回報 huí bào (repay) 迂迴 yū huí （outflank)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 99999

Shuowen 说文解字:

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 迴 mutants 𢌞逥 from spiral (回)囘囬 huí and (rem- 廴 yǐn) from road-and-foot 辶辶辵 chuò C240 迴<𢌞逥> A099 回[迴] simp 回. (name- turn-around (回)迴 huí)

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- a spiral)

Simplification rule : A099 回[迴]

Simplification rule explained :
phonetic-part 回迴 回 (to circulate, to circle) 迴 (revolve)

Variant rule : C240 迴<𢌞逥>

Variant rule clarification :
迴 (revolve) TW 𢌞 <revolve> 逥 <revolve>

Applied rules :

New font rule :

逥字的基本解释

逥
huí
同“迴”。

逥字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huí］
［《廣韻》户恢切，平灰，匣。］
［《廣韻》胡對切，去隊，匣。］
亦作“廻1”。亦作“逥1”。
(1)掉转；返回。
(2)旋转；翻转。
(3)运转；循环。
(4)重复某种动作或重现某种现象。
(5)环绕；围绕。
(6)曲折，迂回。
(7)迂回难行。
(8)避让；回避。
(9)改易；转变。
(10)收回成命。
(11)谓把所得的封赠呈请改授他人。
(12)追述，回忆。
(13)邪，邪恶。参见“迴邪”。
(14)量词。表示动作的次数。
(15)副词。相当于“再”、“又”、“復”。

逥字的康熙字典解释
逥字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
逥字的起名意思

暂无。

To
Basic explanation of words
To
huí
Same as "Back".
To
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［huí］
["Guang Yun" Hu Hui cut, flat gray, box. ]
["Guangyun" Hu cuts, goes to the team, box. ]
Also known as "迴1". Also known as "Fu 1".
(1) Turn around; return.
(2) Rotate; flip.
(3) Operation; circulation.
(4) Repeat a certain action or reproduce a certain phenomenon.
(5) Surround; surround.
(6) Twists and turns.
(7) Difficult to turn around.
(8) Avoid; avoid.
(9) Change; change.
(10) Take it back to death.
(11) It is said that the obtained envelope petition is granted to others.
(12) Retelling, recalling.
(13) Evil, evil. See "Return to evil".
(14) Quantifiers. Indicates the number of actions.
(15) Adverbs. It is equivalent to "zai", "you" and "fu".
